medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was initially noted to have increased lethargy by caretakers, with symptoms reported as worsening without recent distress or signs of infection. The patient has a past medical history of CVA and is wheelchair-bound.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Major left-sided CVA with right hemiplegia, expressive aphasia, wheelchair bound, CKD stage IV, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, depression, thrombocytopenia, impaired glucose tolerance.
medical_history.social_history: Living in an assisted living facility.
